name: Heir of Judgement
description:
Shortly after you pass on from the world, you encounter Death. Instead of determining your fate, Death asks you to become his apprentice and heir, someone to judge lost souls that pass through this limbo dimension and decide if their soul goes to the Light or the Darkness.

As you meet each soul and learn about your own former mortal life, this game will raise questions about morality, power, and hypocrisy.

A game developed by myself, Noah Koecher, and Connor Rogers for USC's Intermediate Game Design class in Spring 2019.
